title: Halls of Torment: Premium (by Erabit Studios)
author: Lull4by
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Halls of Torment: Premium Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose o… DetailsHalls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss. First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile! 【Features】 ◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs ◆ Old school pre-rendered art style ◆ Quest-based meta progression ◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies ◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns ◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles ◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds ◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs ◆ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor ◆ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character ◆ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds 【Full Content List】 ◆ 5 stages with unique environments ◆ 11 playable characters & character marks ◆ 20 blessings that make you stronger for each run ◆ 61 unique items to retrieve and unlock ◆ 98 higher rarity item variants ◆ 72 abilities and ability upgrades ◆ 30 artifacts to customize your game experience ◆ 30+ unique bosses ◆ 50+ unique monsters ◆ 300+ quests to complete ◆ 900+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! 【Contact Us】 Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/P6vekfhc46 Email: [email protected] Genre:Action, Role Playing TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal Itunes Link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/halls-of-torment-premium/id6504841512 Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2218750/Halls_of_Torment/?l=english Had this preordered because it sounded pretty great, haven’t had a chance to boot it up yet but I think I will tonight with this one.
